name: Espresso Exxotica
additionalNotes:
ESPRESSO EXXOTICA is a full-bodied, med/full-strength 6x48 toro. The wrapper is a beautiful 9-year-aged San Andres maduro leaf. Binder and filler tobacco will remain a closely guarded secret...but all tobaccos are 8-11 years aged!
